items.content_html: A Simple Text Repeater is a lightweight tool that takes user input and repeats it multiple times based on a specified count. It can be useful for generating repeated phrases, testing UI elements, or just for fun. Key Features: Customizable Repeats – Users can set how many times the text should be repeated. Line Breaks or Single Line
items.title: Arbaz3008/TextRepeater: A Simple Text Repeater is a lightweight tool that takes user input and repeats it multiple times based on a specified count. It can be useful for generating repeated phrases, testing UI elements, or just for fun.  Key Features:  Customizable Repeats – Users can set how many times the text should be repeated.  Line Breaks or Single Line

items.content_html: A simple, lightweight web application that generates QR codes for URLs and Wi-Fi credentials. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the qrcode.js library, this app allows users to create QR codes and download them as PNG images.
items.title: GihanIT/HTML-QR-Code-Generator-for-WIFI-URLs: A simple, lightweight web application that generates QR codes for URLs and Wi-Fi credentials. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the qrcode.js library, this app allows users to create QR codes and download them as PNG images.

items.content_html: 🌤️ Mini Weather App A simple weather app that fetches real-time data using an API. Search any city to get temperature, conditions, and more. Built with React, it features a clean UI and responsive design. Uses OpenWeather API for accurate forecasts. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use! 🚀 Let me know if you need any changes! 😊
items.title: IntegerSachin7/react-mini-project-weather-app-: 🌤️ Mini Weather App A simple weather app that fetches real-time data using an API. Search any city to get temperature, conditions, and more. Built with React, it features a clean UI and responsive design. Uses OpenWeather API for accurate forecasts. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use! 🚀  Let me know if you need any changes! 😊
